column1: The House of Dol Amroth was a noble house of Gondor whose male heirs were the Princes of Dol Amroth descended from Galador the first prince.  Legend told that his father
column2: Imrazôr the Númenórean married a Silvan Elves named Mithrellas
column3: and from that time forward the house and kin were noble by blood and fair in face and mind.

column1: ==The Family Tree of the House of Dol Amroth==

column2: the first of the Princes of Dol Amroth.  All information in the tree is from The Peoples of Middle-Earth
column4: either The Line of Dol Amroth or The House of Dol Amroth.
column5: p. 221-223  The figures after the names are those of birth and death where recorded (when only one figure is shown it is marked as either the date of birth
column7: † signifies those who did not die of old age.  A name preceded by * indicates one of the Princes.  A name in italics indicates a woman.
